
### TIO: exercise  {.smaller}


* 64-byte blocks, 128 set cache
* stores $64 \times 128 = 8192$ bytes (of data)
* if addresses 32-bits, then how many tag/index/offset bits?

* which bytes are stored in the same block as byte from <code>0x1037</code>?

   * B. byte from <code>0x1021</code>
   * C. byte from <code>0x1035</code>
   * D. byte from <code>0x1041</code>
